ai:cl.c: Resolve network IP addresses and names using Domain Name Servers.

ai:m.c: Resolves an IP address to a host name.

ai:i.c: IP address to be resolved, e.g. 123.111.94.82.

ai:m.c: Resolves a domain name to an official host name and a list of IP addresses.

ai:i.c: The host name to be resolved.

ai:m.c: Resolves an IP address to a host name.

ai:i.c: IP address to be resolved, e.g. "123.111.94.82".

ai:m.c: Resolves a domain name to an official host name and a list of IP addresses.

ai:i.c: The host name to be resolved.

ai:f.c: This function will be called on the completion of any name or address resolution.
Name of the most recently resolved host.
